ithin mama deshapalana satahanuth noliyana eke monawa liyannata dayi kalpana karamin indiddi bohoma parani kawi kipayak mata kiyawannata labuna.me kawi kipaya adata galapewi kiyala mata hithuna nisa obe rasa windanaya udesa ee kawi kihipaya idiripath karannata mama hithuwa.me kawi liya aththe sinhala sahithyaye purogami nawakatha karuweku wu piyadasa sirisena(1875 - 1946) mahathayi.kawiwala mathrukawa "manthrin therimata upadesak" yannayi.1923 di tharam aatha kalayakadi liyawunath me kawi kihipaya adatath ekalesama galapena bawa kawi kiyawaddi apata peniyanawa.
